## User Story
As a user,  
I need to manage my tasks,  
so that I can track and complete my work efficiently.



## Acceptance Criteria

Given the user is logged into the system  
When the user creates a new task with a title and description  
Then the task is saved and appears in the task list  

Given an existing task is displayed  
When the user edits the task details and saves changes  
Then the updated task information is stored successfully  

Given a task exists in the system  
When the user marks the task as complete  
Then the task status is updated to completed
